hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's Fountain# is on the path to #the Tower#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Huge Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Gerudo's Fortress# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #the Graveyard# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path to the #Zora Sapphire#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Purple Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Slingshot#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Water Temple Small Key#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #the Prescription# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a sandy grotto with #fragile walls#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #fairy outside Ganon's Castle# holds #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# can be found in #the Market#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 3 Top

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Purple Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #4# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that obtaining the #underwater silver rupees in Gerudo Training Ground# rewards #the Kokiri Sword#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say all toasters toast toast.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Ice Arrows#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Slingshot#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs# including an Upgrade one.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Wallet#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Wallet#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that racing #Damp's ghost# rewards...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Mirror Shield# and #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Water Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Ice Arrows#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that ##the Temple of Time## has #1# major item.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Huge Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #a Hookshot# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals a chest spawned by #Sun's Song#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.
